verbs.description: belitter (third-person singular simple present belitters, present participle belittering, simple past and past participle belittered)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To strew with litter (for the floor).
(transitive) To bestrew with rubbish or things in disorder.

verbs.description: belitter (third-person singular simple present belitters, present participle belittering, simple past and past participle belittered)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To bring forth a litter; have young; litter.
